creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: landscape with green and brown tall rock formations at top, dotted with trees; water at middle; rocks and trees at bottom

inscription: 花木宿幽鳥　石潭遊美魚　出門行楽久　入室復繙書

title: Spring Scenery; Spring, from a set of "Landscapes of the Four Seasons"
